entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -19.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 12 except minus 1 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries this afternoon. Snow near the Coastal mountains. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High minus 12 except minus 1 over southern sections. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 except minus 7 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. Low minus 25 except minus 7 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 10 except zero over southern sections.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets mixed with snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon except gusting to 60 over southern sections late in the afternoon. High minus 10 except zero over southern sections. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
